steps: Fetch query → spawn parallel tasks: {vector_search, graph_propagation}
Vector: Qdrant HNSW search (topK=64) with ef_search ∈ {64,128}
Graph: Neo4j constraint propagation + precedent expansion (p95<100ms)
Fuse with RRF(k=60); carry provenance per candidate
Emit fused_topk with decision trails & timings
